definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display

sentences.english: The garden is carpeted with a mass of multicoloured flowers .
sentences.chinese: 花園裏花草茂密，五彩繽紛。

sentences.english: Hedgerows and meadows are thick with a tapestry of wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 灌木樹籬和草地中開滿了五彩繽紛的野花。

sentences.english: Let my love , like sunlight, surround you and yet give you illumined freedom.
sentences.chinese: 讓我的愛像陽光一般圍繞你，並給你五彩繽紛的自由。

sentences.english: At the bottom you'll see Yellowstone River winding through the colorful canyon.
sentences.chinese: 在峽谷底我們可看到黃石河穿梭在五彩繽紛的峽谷中。

sentences.english: In this brave new world, ideas are the greatest currency.
sentences.chinese: 在這個五彩繽紛的新世界，點子就是最大的財富。

sentences.english: He likes the night scenes with some colorful light around the river and some buskers singing or dancing on the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡夜間愛河畔那五光十色與街燈五彩繽紛的景色。

sentences.english: There’s a supermarket near me that has the best selection of colorful product packaging!
sentences.chinese: 附近的一家超市有很多食品的包裝五彩繽紛。

sentences.english: Days are colored bubbles that float upon the surface of fathomless night.
sentences.chinese: 日是五彩繽紛的氣泡，飄浮在無盡的夜的表面。

sentences.english: Day are coloured bubbles that float upon the surface of fathomless night.
sentences.chinese: 日是五彩繽紛的氣泡，漂浮在無盡的夜的表面。

sentences.english: Soak in the atmospITe. Enjoy the colors of the earthscape.
sentences.chinese: 融入大自然中，享受自然景緻中的五彩繽紛。

sentences.english: Posters were emblazoned on the walls of the department store.
sentences.chinese: 百貨商店的牆壁上貼滿了五彩繽紛的廣告畫。

sentences.english: Colorful toys and rattles make him smile or reach out for them.
sentences.chinese: 五彩繽紛的玩具，搖鈴使他的笑容或達到爲他們。

sentences.english: He likes the night scenes with some colorful light around the river and some busk ers singing or dancing on the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡夜間愛河畔那五光十色與街燈五彩繽紛的景色。

sentences.english: The firework went off in a cascade of colour.
sentences.chinese: 煙火散開像一片五彩繽紛的瀑布。

sentences.english: The hanging on by sunset red sky, a riot of colours, particularly beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 晚霞掛在被夕陽燒紅的天邊，五彩繽紛，分外美麗。

sentences.english: Spring, the earth was the spring of girls dress was decorated with flowers, and colorful.
sentences.chinese: 春天，大地被春姑娘妝扮得花團錦簇，五彩繽紛。

definition: nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
to set off by contrast/antithesis/analogy parallelism (linguistics)
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
